name: Reference Halfway Log Dump: A Bouldering Guide
categories: Halfway Log Dump: A Bouldering Guide
description: Pack this book along with your shoes and chalk when you head out to Halfway Log Dump on the Bruce Peninsula. This beautifully photographed guidebook includes aerial photographs and maps to help you locate every problem with ease. The boulders sit right on the lake shore so seasonal water level information is also included.
